## Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are checked before submitting -->

**Code Quality:**
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code/documentation
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings

**Testing:**
- [ ] I have tested my changes thoroughly
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

**Documentation:**
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] My changes are reflected in relevant examples

**Philosophy:**
- [ ] My changes align with Stack-Driven philosophy (read PHILOSOPHY.md)
- [ ] If adding commands, they read previous sessions (cascade pattern)
- [ ] If adding commands, they include "What We DIDN'T Choose" section
- [ ] Decisions trace back to user journey

## Review Checklist (for maintainers)

- [ ] Philosophy alignment verified
- [ ] Code/documentation quality acceptable
- [ ] Tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Examples updated (if applicable)
- [ ] No breaking changes (or migration path provided)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated
